snippet: A chance to visit a new and often exotic place with an expert.
abstract: Several American museums promote domestic and international trips that offer the chance to visit a new place with an expert; these programs enliven images of the institutions and at the same time help increase their membership and raise money.
lead_paragraph: A chance to visit a new and often exotic place with an expert.

headline.main: Want to See Cuba? Your Museum Might Take You
headline.print_headline: Want to See Cuba? Your Museum Might Take You
